name: Virus Hunter (Raisin98)
description:
Your computer caught a virus! Thankfully, your anti-virus program deployed the greatest weapon to fight it! Take control over this weapon and eliminate this threat once and for all!

Controls:

Arrow Keys - MovementZ - Shoot
Space - Jump

Credits:

Explosion animation taken from https://untiedgames.itch.io/five-free-pixel-explosions by Will Tice
Everything else by Raisin

This game was made for Mini Jam 47 (https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-47-internet)

Have fun!
